name: Ninja Go Home!!!
description:
This is My first fully released game  was a 3 month project. 

Basic Controls

Keyboard

left arrow - Move Left

right arrow - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump & doublejump   

Q - Kunai Melee

W - side kick melee 

E - Throw ninja Star 

Z - Slide

Gamepad

left d-pad - Move Left

right d-pad - Move Right

A - Jump & doublejump   

Y - Kunai Melee

B - side kick melee 

X - Throw ninja Star 

Right Trigger - Slide
